import React from 'react' interface Props { status: "loading" | "success" | "error" message: string } const ProcessingGif = (props: Props) => { console.log("\n\t ") return (
{ props.status === "loading" ?

{props.message}

: props.status === "success" ?

{props.message}

:

{props.message}

}
) } export default ProcessingGif;
